name: VOOID GOONS
description:
Little hack I made from Tunnel Goons by Nate Treme (https://natetreme.itch.io/tunnelgoons).
Decided to toy around with a 3d6 system instead of 2d6, and eliminating the need of a DS. 
Constructive criticism is always more than welcome!

Vooid Goons is released under Creative Commons 4.0 International License.
